subcollection.subcollection-description: Fuse is meticulously crafted with exquisite detail, employing a variety of yarn types to introduce captivating texture and dimension. Through the skillful blending of different yarn textures, it forms a unique pattern featuring both a linear broken stripe and geometric blocks. This intriguing fabric is available in a palette of 5 distinctive multi-color colorways.

Note is a statement textile that commands attention, equally capable of standing alone or harmonizing with other patterns within the Impact Collection. Its tightly woven bouclé construction lends a subtle luster and a modern, minimalist texture, resulting in a grand and sophisticated appearance. Available in a curated selection of 18 iconic colorways, each hue is edgy, saturated, and deeply resonant.

Pivot is a textile that confidently captures the essence of mid-century design through its dynamic interplay of geometric angles and contemporary colors. Bold lines define distinct color-blocked sections, where contrasting shapes collide to create a visually striking composition. Accents of bold hues and rich jewel tones further enhance its sophisticated character. With every turn and shift in perspective, Pivot establishes a compelling visual rhythm, allowing for bold and expressive design statements.

Summit presents a sophisticated pattern characterized by clean, decisive lines and vibrant pops of color. Its mid-scale geometric design is artfully constructed from trapezoidal shapes, which, when arranged together, subtly suggest stripes within the broader geometric framework. The color palette embraces warm and rich tones, with multi-colored elements carefully coordinated to complement the pattern Pivot.

Twist embodies timeless fashion with a modern sensibility. Its captivating texture arises from the artful intertwining of loopy bouclé yarns, creating a rich and inviting surface. Adding a distinctive touch, an accent of white bouclé gracefully threads through all 10 colorways, providing a subtle yet unifying visual element. Versatile by nature, Twist offers the potential for significant visual impact through striking and thoughtful color arrangements, making it an ideal choice for both understated elegance and bold, contemporary designs.

Cosmos, a biodegradable vinyl that embodies the timeless appeal of weathered leather. Its unique two-tone effect and rugged texture create a sophisticated, lived-in aesthetic, perfect for designs that demand character. Experience the durability and performance of traditional vinyl, with the added benefit of environmentally responsible biodegradable construction.  Available in 24 natural leather colorways.

Gadget is inspired by intricate machinery and layered patterns, showcasing a dynamic geometric network of gears or hexagons, subtly layered over a heathered textile ground. This innovative biodegradable vinyl offers a unique blend of visual complexity and environmental responsibility, breaking down over time to minimize its environmental impact. Available in a curated palette of 10 sophisticated colorways, Gadget is perfect for projects that demand both innovative edge and sustainability.

Gaia, a revolutionary biodegradable vinyl that reimagines classic leather. Inspired by mother Earth herself, Gaia features a meticulously embossed leather grain, enhanced by a delicate crackled effect for a touch of timeless vintage character. Experience the rich, sophisticated look of genuine leather, with the peace of mind that comes from environmentally conscious design. Gaia is crafted to biodegrade, minimizing its impact and celebrating the earth's natural cycles. Available in 28 colorways from earthy neutrals to saturated jewel tones.

Tellus, a groundbreaking biodegradable vinyl that is inspired by the Roman goddess of Earth, offers a unique blend of luxurious texture and robust performance. Its intricately woven-like surface provides a stunning tactile experience, mimicking the elegance of fabric, while maintaining the resilience and longevity of traditional vinyl. Redefining sustainable design and environmental impact, Tellus biodegrades naturally, reducing waste and contributing to a healthier planet. Available 22 complex and saturated colorways.

Universe, a biodegradable vinyl fabric that evokes the grandeur of the cosmos. With a network of constellation-inspired pattern, reminiscent of the organic swirls of nautilus shells, starbursts, or blooming flowers, Universe creates a sense of wonder and tranquility. The gentle ebb and flow of the design adds a touch of organic elegance. Available in 7 serene, tone-on-tone colorways inspired by nature's palette, Universe is a harmonious blend of style and sustainability.

Chev's stunning menswear texture and extensive 16-color palette offer a touch of refined luxury, while its innovative design prioritizes sustainability. With over 50% of its polymer derived from bio-attributed forestry materials and a backing made entirely from recycled PET bottles, Chev represents a significant advancement in eco-conscious interior design.

Enliven is an elegant fabric that features a contemporary allover pattern.  Enliven is suitable for privacy curtain use, drapery, and bedspreads. A wide range of colors from Ecru to Turquoise offers a multitude of healthcare options from neutral to bright.

Fleck, a Supreen fabric, offers a truly captivating textile experience. It's a meticulously crafted blend of multicolored yarns, woven into a richly textured, soft boucle that's designed for exceptional performance. The unique yarn combinations create 21 colorways that are not only saturated and bright, but also possess a dynamic, multi-dimensional quality.

Adorned with a rhythmic dot arrangement, Focus blends performance and visual appeal. Inspired by collegiate tones, the seven energetic colorways of Focus adapt to many market segments. Crafted with a durable 80% vinyl, phthalate-free face and a 20% polyester backing, Focus offers both longevity and a comfortable feel.

Palermo II is a premium polyurethane polycarbonate seating fabric that has a distinctive pebble grain embossing, enhanced by a subtle tonal tip print that adds depth and dimension to its surface. This refined texture not only elevates its visual appeal but also provides a soft, tactile feel. This Mayer favorite introduces 18 new colors, thoughtfully curated to reflect a palette of muted, earthy tones that exude warmth and culture.

Combine beauty and peace of mind with Pavilion, a phthalate-free vinyl upholstery. The graceful, organic pattern, inspired by falling leaves, brings natural tranquility to interiors. Available in a palette of 6 serene, nature-inspired colors, Pavilion offers both aesthetic appeal and a connection to the natural world.

Inspired by the dance of sunlight through layered leaves, Foliage is a captivating pattern that stimulates a sense of organic movement and natural beauty. With its intricate design of vining leaves and interplay of light and shadow, Foliage creates a visually stimulating and dynamic aesthetic. Six distinct colorways constructed in SEAQUAL® YARN offer a range of complementary ground shades accented by vibrant leaf hues, each drawing inspiration from the harmonious palette of nature.

Experience the texture and performance of Nimble. This pattern's soft hand and heathered chenille construction provide a sense of harmony and soothing comfort. Available in 10 versatile colors, Nimble is the perfect choice for healthcare settings. Its Crypton finish and moisture barrier backing ensure durability and easy maintenance, making it an ideal solution for high-traffic environments.

With its flowing design and symmetrical arrangement, Ripple is influenced by the soothing rhythm of raindrops echoing across water pools. As a large-scale geometric pattern, Ripple captures the essence of organic movement and tranquility evoking a sense of peace and healing. Offered in seven carefully selected SEAQUAL® YARN colors to stimulate positive emotional connections and designed to create a sense of calm and wellbeing.

Ritzi is a timeless pattern featuring a classic boucle texture that creates a sense of cozy nostalgia. Its refined, saturated colors are rooted in the natural world, drawing inspiration from traditional dying techniques using plants and minerals to create rich hues. The Supreen fluid barrier provides extra protection. Experience the warmth and comfort of Ritzi’s 23 rejuvenating colorways.

Inspired by the towering heights of redwood trees, Sequoia is a pattern of grandeur and serenity. Its intricate design captures the beauty and majesty of treetop canopies. Available in six nature-inspired colors and a Crypton finish and moisture barrier backing, Sequoia is ideal for healthcare settings. While its soothing and calming aesthetic creates a welcoming and relaxing atmosphere.

collection-name: Common Thread For The Cure Collection

subcollection.subcollection-description: Embellish refers to the elaborate decorations and stitches used to embellish quilts. Buttons, lace, and ribbon were frequently used. Animals and flowers seem to be the favorite embroidery themes. Some quilters believed that embroidering a spider on its web would bring good luck to the quilter.

Inspired by the dance of sunlight through layered leaves, Foliage is a captivating pattern that stimulates a sense of organic movement and natural beauty. With its intricate design of vining leaves and interplay of light and shadow, Foliage creates a visually stimulating and dynamic aesthetic. Six distinct colorways constructed in SEAQUAL® YARN offer a range of complementary ground shades accented by vibrant leaf hues, each drawing inspiration from the harmonious palette of nature.

Friendship Quilt refers to a quilt made by a group of friends, with each participant making and signing one or more of the patchwork blocks. Our Friendship privacy curtain fabric consists of many geometric shapes or blocks in a dramatic large-scale multi-colored rendering.

Kantha is an embroidery technique used by Bengali women for centuries to repurpose remnants from saris into quilts by layering them together using running stitch. The artisans of Kantha either told a story or imparted wishes for loved ones through their quilts. These women would sometimes “autograph” their pieces to indicate their relationship with a recipient of the kantha. our Kantha interpretation uses a thick boucle juxtaposed with finer yarns to mimic the original quilts.

With its flowing design and symmetrical arrangement, Ripple is influenced by the soothing rhythm of raindrops echoing across water pools. As a large-scale geometric pattern, Ripple captures the essence of organic movement and tranquility evoking a sense of peace and healing. Offered in seven carefully selected SEAQUAL® YARN colors to stimulate positive emotional connections and designed to create a sense of calm and wellbeing.

Saori is an improvisational hand-weaving technique rooted in the philosophy that beauty can be found in irregular patterning created through individual expression. According to Misao Jo, the founder of Saori, the “SA” of SAORI has the same meaning as the first syllable of the work “SAI” which is found in Zen vocabulary. It means everything has its own individual dignity. “ORI” means weaving. Our Saori leaf pattern emulates this technique through the use of a unique stria effect that creates random-looking texture in the leaves.

Inspired by the towering heights of redwood trees, Sequoia is a pattern of grandeur and serenity. Its intricate design captures the beauty and majesty of treetop canopies. Available in six nature-inspired colors and a Crypton finish and moisture barrier backing, Sequoia is ideal for healthcare settings. While its soothing and calming aesthetic creates a welcoming and relaxing atmosphere.

Serene is inspired by a picturesque landscape depicting a daybreak reflection over the ocean. Repeating circles with a unique patterning are created by multi-color striations of SEAQUAL® YARN (Post-Consumer Recycled Polyester) fill yarns.

Tranquility is a line work pattern inspired by a cascade of rain falling down a windowpane and accented with a multicolored stripe made of SEAQUAL® YARN (Post-Consumer Recycled Polyester) fill yarns thus creating a cross hatched pattern.

A flower, especially cultivated for its beauty, Bloom is both graceful and evocative. The grand scale of the neutral flower petals tumbles softly onto a sophisticated backdrop to create an impactful impression.
As if floating on a pond, these graceful small floral buds dance effortlessly on a ground of subtle textured weaves. Flora proves that romance and performance can be beautifully intertwined.

Tranquil and at peace, Sanctuary combines the softness of chenille with an undulated weave that reminds us of a place of solace and refuge. Inspired by colors found in nature, this abundant palette of 15 colors is reminiscent of fresh flowers and fauna.
Elongated low areas often running between hills or mountains, Valley, combines the vertical striping pattern of Vista with inset horizontal yarns to create a breathtaking plaid effect.

With its multi-colored stripe layout, Vista, a versatile polyester acrylic epingle, whose pristine patterning can be compared to a narrow line of trees found on a mountaintop with a spectacular view. All 5 colors are bursting with fresh muti-colored combinations that work perfectly with all the patterns in the collection.

Woven with nine captivating colorways, Amalfi reflects the rich tapestry of coastal landscapes. Colorways, inspired by the deep blues of the ocean, the earthy tones of the cliffs, and the pops of color that represent the vibrant flowers or painted buildings found in a seaside town. Each colorway features a mesmerizing interplay of different colored blocks, creating a unique and intriguing stripe pattern.

The nubby boucle weave of Belize creates a visually stunning and undeniably soft fabric. The thick loops add to this classic pattern. Dive into rich, saturated solids inspired by the dazzling hues of the Caribbean Sea. Imagine the deep turquoise waters, fiery coral reefs, and lush island foliage reflected in these energizing colors. Belize also offers a selection of calming neutrals and sophisticated two-toned options.

Featuring a fluid stripe pattern in calming, multi-colored tones, Riviera offers a sense of tranquility and invites relaxation. The small-scale texture adds subtle visual interest without overwhelming the design, creating a perfect pairing with Amalfi, Belize, and Tulum. Stunning colorways reflective of the rich tapestry of a coastline retreat - sandy beiges, soft watery blues and driftwood gray are all reminiscent of a beach getaway.

Tulum features a large-scale, organic leaf pattern that evokes the lush foliage of the tropics. The unique texture, created by twisted fill yarn, adds depth and dimension. Ranging from the calming tones of palmetto to the vibrant energy of tangelo, and the serene elegance of soft sea salt, each colorway features eye-catching contrasts that guarantees Tulum will be the star of the show.

Caspian gets its name from the Caspian Sea, the world’s largest inland sea. Utilizing soft polyester chenille weft yarns and woven on a SEAQUAL® YARN warp, Caspian gets its beautiful allover plush texture from its alternating subtle shades of chenille

The Denali pattern is a symphony of geometric precision, its clean lines and stark contrasts demands attention and leaves a lasting impression. This is a fabric that doesn't shy away; it commands the spotlight and thrives in its boldness.

Leoni is meticulously crafted in seven color combinations that echo the seasons of the year. Lush spring blossoms melt into the vibrant greens of summer, then surrender to the fiery embrace of autumn. Let Leoni wrap your furniture and discover the breathtaking beauty that blooms.

Mira, is one of only two rivers in Portugal and one of the few rivers in Europe. A simple texture considered a dimensional woven structure of alternating thick (olefin) and thin (polyester) yarns on a SEAQUAL® YARN polyester warp creates a tight weave formation.

Serene is inspired by a picturesque landscape depicting a daybreak reflection over the ocean. Repeating circles with a unique patterning are created by multi-color striations of SEAQUAL® YARN (Post-Consumer Recycled Polyester) fill yarns.

Tranquility is a line work pattern inspired by a cascade of rain falling down a windowpane and accented with a multicolored stripe made of SEAQUAL® YARN (Post-Consumer Recycled Polyester) fill yarns thus creating a cross hatched pattern.
Elegantly simple, Adler’s midscale soft chenille chevron makes it a signature pattern. Available in 5 modern classic colorways.
With a neutral palette and fine vertical slub yarn, Delmar depicts a subtle beauty and evokes interest in its soft chenille hand. Available in 7 soothing colorways.

Durango is an extreme performance faux leather grain vinyl with an extensive color line that meets the needs of all commercial markets including corporate, healthcare, hospitality, retail, education, and government.
The two-tone twisted yarns of Lancaster portray a contemporary basket-like texture and gives the fabric a chunky hand. Available in 10 complex colorways.

Sophisticated in style, performance and durability, Omega is the perfect choice for high traffic areas. The understated patina effect and supple hand add to the refinement of its 18 classic leather colorways.
Seville is small in scale yet upscale with its plush irregular grid texture bringing comfort and affordability together. Available in 8 tranquil colorways.

A detailed interpretation of Art Deco’s decorative scallops, Fitz is constructed of silky chenille fill yarns and a lustrous warp that defines each unique shell. Resulting in a glamorous textured and timeless scalloped pattern available in 10 exquisite colors.

Inspired by overlapping organic shapes, Harper is a unique distressed geometric botanical. Its soft curving lines and intricate detail make this mid-scale Crypton fabric a standout. With the soothing colors of Lily, Bamboo, and Primrose to enchanted colors of Marigold, Carnation, and Indigo, Harper is suitable applications in modern and transitional interiors.

Webster is a midscale design of luminous linework. Multi-colored twisted accent yarns create a network of layered lines that add dimensional interest to the fabric. Available in 9 colors, Webster is suited for dining to club chairs in heavy traffic spaces.

Lyric features a classic linen print with a sophisticated and generous range of 18 colors that includes foundational neutrals and delightful pops of on-trend options, this classic vinyl textile is both fresh and timeless.

With a hint of allure, Sonnet, showcases a watery linear strie, a fine silky slub emboss, and a soft poetic color palette. Featuring 24 subdued colors and of exceptional performance, Sonnet is ideal for use in healthcare and senior living environments.

Utopia is influenced by the classic tones of tailored suiting. This cozy and inviting boucle fabric is speckled with multicolored yarns giving the fabric a warm woolly sweater feeling. Cuddle up in the performance and soft hand of Utopia.

Characterized by its bold arching lines and symmetric design, Arc, is an interpretation of the sleek architectural design of the Art Deco movement. A movement known for its chic colors and sleek geometric patterns; Arc’s vibrant color palette will be the focal point of upholstered furniture.

Designed to make a formal statement, Beaux’s fine needlepoint striping has a faint herringbone effect. The foundation of Beaux’s color palette reflects architectural stone facades; in addition to richly saturated blues, greens, and purples all with multi-colored accents.

What’s old is new again with Retro. A mid-scale pattern of repeating circles with colorways reminiscent of heritage interiors. Harvest Gold, Avocado, and Lavender are vintage colorways that continue to be iconic and remarkably fresh. Retro’s nostalgic color palette and unique pattern, make this woven ideal for all markets.

A uniquely embossed surface texture and advanced technology plays into the soft hand and aesthetically pleasing appeal of this silicone fabric. In addition to its appealing allure, Empire is a medical grade silicone that meet the most stringent demands of commercial interiors without the addition of flame retardants, antibacterial and antimicrobial additives, or surface finishes.

Sophisticated in style, performance and durability, Omega is the perfect choice for high traffic areas. The understated patina effect and supple hand add to the refinement of its 18 classic leather colorways.

Prospect is a sleek polycarbonate featuring a smooth refined grain emboss giving the fabric a look of casual meets comfort. Colorways work in both modern and transitional interior spaces, making it suitable for all markets.

Spartan, with its leather like grain, is the ultimate performance vinyl, engineered for indoor, outdoor, and marine upholstery. Offering outstanding solar resistance, as well as resistance to mildew and pink staining. Spartan comes in an array of 35 fresh colorways: incorporating contemporary bright pops of color along with a wide range of neutral classics.
Woven in 100% post-consumer recycled polyester, Connect features unique repeating hexagon shapes that link together to create a clean yet complex multicolored jacquard design.

Large in scale, Fractal is a multi-colored jacquard where each geometric shape appears to ebb and flow into one another, creating the appearance of a never-ending pattern. Woven in 100% post-consumer recycled polyester.
A small-scale jacquard of micro circles that repeat and form small clusters within the overall design. Loop is woven in 100% post-consumer recycled polyester.
A mid-scale jacquard woven in 100% post-consumer recycled polyester; Vertex is a network of lines that intersect at every angle.

Fleck, a Supreen fabric, offers a truly captivating textile experience. It's a meticulously crafted blend of multicolored yarns, woven into a richly textured, soft boucle that's designed for exceptional performance. The unique yarn combinations create 21 colorways that are not only saturated and bright, but also possess a dynamic, multi-dimensional quality.

A little slice of textile heaven. A luxuriously supple hand, Haven emanates comfort and elegance with a range of colors from soft neutrals of Cream, Dove, and Sandcastle to deep gem tones of Peacock, Ocean, and Peridot.

Woven to create a lasting impression, Legacy is a piece dyed fabric that uses alternating-colored yarns to create a duotone design. The color line is supported by grounding neutrals and saturated with vibrate warm and cool tones.

A new take on a houndstooth pattern with a rich wool like texture. Scout’s sophisticated palette comes in 14 beautiful multi-colored colorways; from traditional two-tones, rustic reds, and golds to elevated blues and greens.

Utopia is influenced by the classic tones of tailored suiting. This cozy and inviting boucle fabric is speckled with multicolored yarns giving the fabric a warm woolly sweater feeling. Cuddle up in the performance and soft hand of Utopia.

Ritzi is a timeless pattern featuring a classic boucle texture that creates a sense of cozy nostalgia. Its refined, saturated colors are rooted in the natural world, drawing inspiration from traditional dying techniques using plants and minerals to create rich hues. The Supreen fluid barrier provides extra protection. Experience the warmth and comfort of Ritzi’s 23 rejuvenating colorways.

Channel features a minimalistic ribbed velvet with versatile application for all commercial interiors. The wales or ridges of a cord fabric are created by extra filling yarns woven into the background, thus the designation featherwale for a fabric like Channel. An elegant and durable version of corduroy, Channel is piece dyed in a nice range of colors including Peppermint, Evergreen and Coral and is suitable for all commercial interior markets.

Form uses a fine boucle yarn to mimic grospoint in a range of classic and trending colors. Grospoint is a non-directional, high-performance, pile fabric. Commonly made of wool or synthetic fibers, it has larger loops than a frieze and resembles the ground area of needlepoint. Form is a great replica of this high-end construction and features a commensurate classic yet vibrant color palette.

Function features the look and feel of linen in a perfectly balanced, high-performance texture. The use of classic twill and natural slubbing effects creates tactile surface interest. Fashion-inspired colors range from warm greys and browns to jewel tones. Subtle color variation and shading result from cationic disperse dyeing contributing to the fabric’s natural quality. Function is perfect for all commercial markets as well as residential interiors.

Gatsby is being launched as the Crypton version of Fedora and is the perfect complement to Crypton Structures. As one of our bestselling upholstery fabrics, Fedora has provided design solutions for interior applications in all markets. Now, with the attributes of Crypton technology, Gatsby expands the opportunities for adoption and specification even further. Perfect for all commercial interiors as well as a home office. Available in the same successful color palette as Fedora.

Gravity features a natural linen look in an elegant and refined piece-dyed quality. Colors inspired by nature are subtly blended as a result of the TPE fusing process. The palette is versatile, ranging from reflective metallic hues to soft colors of the ocean. Gravity’s classic design and heavy-duty performance characteristics make it perfect for upholstery application in all commercial settings.

Matter features a versatile polyurethane textured look that can stand on its own or work as a complement to patterns Molecule and Vector. An extensive range of colors featuring cool and smoky neutrals as well as jewel tones works nicely with Mayer’s entire range of coated fabrics. Matter is a versatile fabric that is perfect for upholstered applications in all commercial markets.

Molecule features a geometric hexagon “beehive” motif rendered in a dimensional, quilted construction with a matte finish. Colors are inspired by nature’s kaleidoscope from iridescent shell to deep indigo. Perfect for hospitality, healthcare and other commercial environments, Molecule is a great small-to-medium scale design suitable for a wide range of upholstered furniture styles.

Relativity features a TPE fused texture with multi-colored striation. This Tekloom pattern is an exclusive Mayer design in a classic construction. A versatile color palette beautifully blends iridescent mineral colors with plant inspired hues. Like Gravity, Relativity is an elegant, extreme performance textile that offers a multitude of opportunities for use in all markets.

Static features another distinctive Mayer Tekloom design that uses a reflective yarn to create a new and innovative twist on a classic construction. Texture is created using a deflective weave and a layer of accents resulting in a high-tech look. Beautiful yet heavy duty, Static is suitable for all commercial environments. Colors mimic ambiguous neutrals and burnished metals from nature’s vast palette.

Vector is a quantum-inspired pattern from nature that emulates the structure of a spider’s web. The seemingly random design is printed on a subtle grid. Two layers of polyurethane make this dimensional color effect possible. The result is a dimensional pattern and color story in shades of polished stone, copper, and burnished bark. Vector offers performance value in a new modern classic design aesthetic for all markets.

Jive is a chevron motif combined with a bright tissue effect produces a jazzy zig-zag in this versatile chair pattern. Classic contract color combinations feature Midnight blue, Bordeaux, Emerald, Pewter and Aubergine hues to name a few. Jive is a great well-price option for corporate as well as hospitality interiors.

Rumba features a versatile chair pattern in which interwoven warp and weft yarns create an abstract linear grid. Careful layering produces dimension and sophistication in this affordable fabric. Color combinations include warm and cool neutrals such as Bisque, Abalone and Butterscotch along with earthier tones Fossil and Char.

Samba features a random swirl motif woven on a textured ground. Motifs are layered in order to create dimension in a tried and true classic design. Jewel and gem tones form the basis of the Samba color line and include vivid shades of Cerulean, Emerald, Persimmon and Burgundy.

Tango features a multi-colored, modern geometric design for seating application in all markets. A lot of look for the money with great performance value, Tango features a tight, intricately woven yarn construction. The color palette is fresh and fashion forward with a great foundation of neutrals and touches of rose, coral and cerulean blue.

Botany features an interwoven structure of densely packed yarn in colors of flora and fauna such as Hyacinth, Aster, Willow, and Spearmint. In a close-up study of this pattern, you will find a deliberate structure of a natural linen colored warp with subtle pops of complex colors such as those referenced above.

Labyrinth is reminiscent of the mazes found in the gardens. The pattern takes you on a guided tour of rich, and playful color combinations in a beautiful, high-performance velvety textile. Labyrinth’s saturated jewel tones complement the more subdued, complex colors that are found throughout the collection.

Landscape features a large-scale design that suggests an aerial view of the Majorelle garden’s topography. Subtly contrasting yarn colors are twisted together in this intricately constructed fabric. Colors are earthy combinations of neutrals in the ground cast with hues of Hosta, Marigold, Salvia and Grass.

Refuge serves as the collection’s lush, chenille-velvet coordinate in 13 opulent colorways. This solid pattern mimics the lush and vividly colored cactus, lilies, jasmine and palm trees of Majorelle. Refuge works as a coordinate or stands alone as an elegant and versatile statement fabric.

Villa features a linear design and classic geometric motif. Small chenille rectangles are connected and layered on a dry cotton/linen ground. The overall effect is a versatile fabric with a nice integration of pattern and textural elements. Earth tones dominate the color palette with hints of Olive, Cornflower, Eggplant, Terra Cotta and Bark.
Bali features a rich textural fabric woven in a dense yarn construction. Versatile colors in mingled combinations use boucle to create a sophisticated texture, ideal for commercial interiors.
Havana features a tightly constructed texture with natural slubbing and refined striation. A range of neutrals, medium tones, and pastel shades suits upholstery across all commercial markets.
Sydney adds a soft touch with chenille-like textural elements. A neutral foundation is complemented by Citrus and Mulberry tones for a fresh palette suitable for a range of seating applications.
Coated fabric with Soil & Stain Resistant Top Coat and Ink Resistant Technology; GREENGUARD Certified. 78% Vinyl (phthalate free) face, 22% polyester backing.
Coated fabric with Soil & Stain Resistant Top Coat and Ink Resistant Technology; GREENGUARD Certified. 78% Vinyl face, 22% polyester backing.

The fine crosshatching pattern on this fabric, Acuco, takes its cue from a similar allover pattern meticulously hand-painted on a pottery vase made by an artist from Acoma Pueblo in New Mexico. In further exploration into Alexander Girard’s sketches, one can find similarities between some of his pen drawings and this detailed pottery.

Inspiration for this delightful fabric, Comalapa, was adapted from a woven and embroidered Guatemalan blouse, or again huipil, made by the Cakchiquel people of Chimaltenango, Guatemala. This crafty interpretation features playful, abstract birds floating among small geometric shapes, highlighted with intentional stitches to create a fanciful version of the original.

Young women of the 18th and 19th centuries learned to mend and repair worn and torn cloth by recreating different stitches on what are known as darning samplers. These small, delicate “practice pieces” are now works of art featuring various woven patterns in patches of colored thread on linen ground cloth. The inspiration for Haarlem, made in 1750 in the Netherlands, is part of a larger collection amassed by Girard’s grandfather.

The colorful, micro zig-zag pattern featured on Huipil [wi’pil] takes its cue from a handwoven blouse, or huipil, as they are known in San Lucas Tolimán, the highland village in Guatemala. Huipils are made from simple, solid-colored cotton with embroidered symbols and characters and are also woven in multiple colors and patterns. Like our Huipil color combinations, no matter the assemblage of pattern, the end result is always colorful.

Inspired by the folklore around Milagro, meaning “miracle” in Spanish, our bold, multi-colored interpretation of the “eye” will definitely ward off evil spirits. Cultures all over the world believe in the healing and protective powers of Milagros. They are made of silver and or pewter and come in a variety of forms. Milagros also bring good luck in love, travel or general well-being. In the lobby of the Museum of International Folk Art, one can see the extensive collection of Milagros collected by Alexander Girard.

Puno is a regional travel hub, considered Peru’s “folkloric capital,” and is known for its distinct music, dance and wool products. This versatile striped fabric, of the same name, was inspired by a solid wool poncho featuring wide bands of color running through the center and along the sides. To further achieve the look, feel and color saturation of wool, two different acrylic yarns were used: one plain and one mélange.

A wall hanging or “chakla” from Gujarat, India was the inspiration for this playful grid pattern. On the original textile, the black and white checkerboard is strategically colored and punctuated with small, mirrored circles embroidered into the textile to create a formal grid-like flower. Sula means “sun” and is associated with peace. Our happy interpretation pays homage to the original pattern and Girard’s passionate collecting of sun symbols and motifs.
